name: Forest Of Trees
description:
This is the first ever game I fully completed back in 2017. I modeled everything and designed everything you see in the game with the help of tutorials. 

My main profession is music as I have been a musican for over 16 years as of 2021. So I created most of the sound effects and I wrote over 1 hour and 30 mins of music for the game.

This game took me 6 months to create and I am really proud of it.
